name: SLACK_WORKSPACE_URL
description: The full base URL of the Slack workspace (e.g., 'https://your-team.slack.com').

name: XOXD_TOKEN
description: The Slack authentication 'd' cookie token required for API access.

name: XOXC_TOKEN
description: The Slack 'xoxc' authentication token required for API access.

name: TENANT_ID
description: The Slack tenant (workspace) ID, which typically starts with 'T'.
